name: Marathon Education
tagline: Edtech soon-icorn*, provider of live online tutoring classes to K-12 students in Southeast Asia, starting with Vietnam
description: We are an edtech startup based in Vietnam (head-quartered in HCMC), venture-backed (by Forge Ventures, Venturra Discovery, iSeed SEA, and other angel investors). We provide live online tutoring services to K-12 students in Southeast Asia and Vietnam.
